title: On pills and needles: To hell and back; Dad's story of teen son overdose
itunes:title: On pills and needles: To hell and back; Dad's story of teen son overdose
description:
About 115 Americans die each day from opioid overdoses, a frightening statistic for parents. When Rick Van Warner's son went missing, the father's battle to save his son from becoming one of the countless victims began. Warner and shares his story in a book "On Pills and Needles: The Relentless Fight to Save My Son from Opioid Addiction." He joins Nancy Grace to talk about the struggle, along with Los Angeles psychiatrist Dr. Carole Lieberman, and opioid addiction expert Dr. William Morrone.
